description:
Alicia met Darkrai in the garden and befriended her. Bad Dreams is the name of Darkrai`s Ability and it made people that were close and asleep near it to have bad dreams. Darkrai didn`t usually appear around people because of this.
In Gaudy`s diary, Gaudy wrote that Alice`s grandmother Alicia opened Darkrai`s heart by helped Darkrai when it was injured. Darkrai has stayed in the garden and it saved Alice as a little girl after she fell off a cliff.
Darkrai gained the trust of the people in √Ålamos Town after it protected them against Dialga and Palkia.
name: Darkrai
